semantics.label: translate:: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: translate:: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: translate:: Question Type
fields.description: translate:: Select the look and behaviour of the question.

fields.label: translate:: Give one point for the whole task
fields.description: translate:: Enable to give a total of one point for multiple correct answers. This will not be an option in "Single answer" mode.

fields.label: translate:: Randomize answers
fields.description: translate:: Enable to randomize the order of the answers on display.

fields.label: translate:: Require answer before the solution can be viewed
translate:: Automatically check answers
fields.description: translate:: Enabling this option will make accessibility suffer, make sure you know what you're doing.

fields.label: translate:: Pass percentage
fields.description: translate:: This setting often won't have any effect. It is the percentage of the total score required for getting 1 point when one point for the entire task is enabled, and for getting result.success in xAPI statements.

fields.label: translate:: Show score points
fields.description: translate:: Show points earned for each answer. This will not be an option in 'Single answer' mode or if 'Give one point for the whole task' option is enabled.

fields.label: translate:: Body text
fields.default: translate:: Are you sure you wish to finish ?
